title: DAO #10 - Form dev / marketing fund
body:
Why do you need a dev / marketing fund?

- For the development of the NFT Mystery Box Platform, funds are needed for the existence of the team
- We plan to undergo an audit from HashEx
- Funds are needed for lock tokens / LP at CryptEx
- We plan to conduct a marketing campaign before the launch of the farming, during the farming, before the launch of the platform

What marketing activities are we planning to carry out?

1. We have already launched ads on bogged.finance and poocoin.app. We are waiting for the first results
2. When we carry out the transformation, we will make a placement on coinhunt, coinsniper, coinvote
3. We are planning to hold an AMA session in third-party groups (Moonshot hunters, etc.)
4. Make posts on Telegram / Twitter with the influencer Rocket Signals
5. Launch banner ads from NFT Mystery Box on BSCScan, Coinsniper about the platform

We will send 10% of the tokens to this fund, which were intended for farming, and we plan to burn the remaining 3.5%
author: 0xb77549FD4D20b6FCeeA883ecE79b5e593dcca37D
